title: Rajasi Diamond Bridal Haaram - The Empress Necklace
materials: meticulously studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds
Pink stone accents and Blue Sapphire pendants. Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A breathtaking statement piece, this Haaram features an intricate floral and paisley design, symbolic of prosperity and auspicious beginnings. The cascading tiers of CZ diamonds create a mesmerizing sparkle, while the emerald and pink stone accents add a touch of royalty. The unique pendant adds a modern twist to the traditional design, making it truly one-of-a-kind.
colors: Predominantly brilliant white (CZ Diamonds) with vibrant emerald green
and royal blue accents. The gold provides a warm and luxurious backdrop.
occasions: and other special events where you want to make a lasting impression. Also suitable for Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: This Rajasi Diamond Bridal Haaram is a stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The exceptional craftsmanship, brilliant sparkle, and vibrant color palette make it a true heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, while the high-quality CZ diamonds offer exceptional value. Symbolizing prosperity and auspicious beginnings, this Haaram is the perfect embodiment of love and commitment.
